price: ߊ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߡߊߛߍ߬ߟߍ߲߬ߓߍ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߞߊ߲߬ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߖߍ߬ߘߍ ߖߌ߰ߕߍ߰ߣߍ߲߫ ߠߋ߫ ߦߋ߲߬
arabic: لَا يُفَتَّرُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِيهِ مُبۡلِسُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lā yufattaru ʿanhum wahum fīhi mub'lisūna
